FileSystemFileHandleGetFile.summary:
The getFile() method of the
interface returns a {{jsxref('Promise')}} which resolves to a
object representing the state on disk of the entry represented by the handle.

remarks.para:
If the file on disk changes or is removed after this method is called, the returned
object will likely be no longer readable.

-File System Access API
-The File System Access API: simplifying access to local files

FileSystemFileHandleGetFile.returns: A {{jsxref('Promise')}} which resolves to a object.
